SELECT
from c_auth_menu where is_enable = true
and group_= #{group, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and (is_public = true or id in ( SELECT authority_id FROM c_auth_role_authority ra INNER JOIN c_auth_user_role ur on ra.role_id = ur.role_id INNER JOIN c_auth_role r on r.id = ra.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=BIGINT} and r.is_enable = true and ra.authority_type = 'MENU' ) ) ORDER BY sort_value asc
